mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (chat_id, room_id, sender, sender_email, chat_message, send_date) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_NO.NEXTVAL, -- 시퀀스 사용 #{room.id}, #{sender}, #{senderEmail}, #{message}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP -- SYSDATE 또는 TIMESTAMP 사용 )
mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_id AS id, c.room_id AS room_id, c.sender AS sender, c.sender_email AS senderEmail, c.chat_message AS message, c.send_date AS sendDate FROM chat c WHERE c.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY c.send_date ASC
